name: The Three Door Hanover Sideboard
description: A classic signature style Davidson sideboard that elevates any interior by its elegant chamfered edged frame and superior quality of finishing. The cabinet can be finished in any of DAVIDSON's gorgeous timber finishes with a stunning radial pattern, now synonymous with Davidson furniture. Shown here with three push latch doors, the cabinet boasts a metal trim for an extra touch of opulence, all standing on a well proportioned facetted base. The interior of the cabinet opens to reveal a satin interior with two adjustable shelves, with bespoke options available upon request.
